name: American Cancer Society: Discovery Shop (San Jose)
description: Thrift store accepting donations; proceeds support cancer research and patient programs
fullDescription: The American Cancer Society Discovery Shop in San Jose is a thrift store selling quality secondhand and vintage items, with proceeds supporting cancer research and patient programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept accessories and housewares
- Accept linens and furniture
- Accept collectibles and vintage items
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds fund cancer research
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Discovery Shop at 1103 Branham Ln, San Jose
2. Donate gently used items
3. Or shop for affordable goods
4. Check website for hours
5. All purchases benefit ACS programs
keywords: ACS, American Cancer Society, Discovery Shop, San Jose, thrift store, donate clothes, secondhand, vintage, charity shop, clothing donation, furniture donation
